item.title: 英国央行拉姆斯登认为有更多降息空间，风险 "平衡
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长戴夫-拉姆斯登（Dave Ramsden）表示，仍有进一步降息的空间，预计来自服务业和工资的价格压力将继续缓解。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden said there is still scope to cut interest rates further, predicting price pressures from the services sector and wages will continue to ease.】

item.title: 里克-佩里的能源房地产投资信托公司费米将首次公开募股目标提高到 7.15 亿美元
item.description: 费米公司增加了首次公开发行股票的数量，并正在寻求筹集多达 7.15 亿美元的资金，而上周的目标是筹集多达 5.5 亿美元。【原文：Fermi Inc. increased the number of shares in its initial public offering and is seeking to raise as much as $715 million, up from a target of as much as $550 million last week.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 因可转债减记提议而股价下挫
item.description: 植物性肉类生产商 Beyond Meat Inc. 向债务人提出要约收购，这不仅将消除 8 亿多美元的债务，还将抹去该公司大部分股票价值，此后该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Plant-based meat producer Beyond Meat Inc. shares are plunging after making debtholders an offer that will erase more than $800 million of debt, but also most of the stock’s value.】

item.title: 阿波罗旗下雷诺-德-美第奇公司与顾问合作削减成本
item.description: 意大利包装公司 Reno de Medici SpA 正与一家运营顾问公司合作制定一项削减成本计划，以扭转其运营困境，解决现金消耗问题。【原文：Italian packaging firm Reno de Medici SpA is working with an operational adviser on a cost-cutting plan in an effort to turn around its operations as it’s grappling with cash burn.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与债券持有人开始有限制的债务重组谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一组国际债权人开始与埃塞俄比亚进行限制性谈判，双方正努力重组一笔 10 亿美元的违约债券。【原文：A group of international creditors began restricted talks with Ethiopia, as the two sides work to restructure a $1 billion defaulted bond, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国债在油价暴跌中保持涨势 月末将至
item.description: 周一美股早盘，受油价暴跌和英国国债反弹的支撑，以及对周二月末指数再平衡的买盘预期，国债保持小幅上涨。【原文：Treasuries held small gains in early US trading Monday, supported by a slump in oil prices and a rally in UK government bonds, and by anticipation of buying into Tuesday’s month-end index rebalancing.】

item.description: 在交易启动速度低于预期的市场中，一连串大胆的大型并购让交易商们倍感振奋。【原文：A rush of big, bold mergers and acquisitions is lifting dealmakers in an otherwise slower-than-expected market for getting transactions off the ground.】

item.title: 以色列因加沙战争风险暂缓加息
item.description: 以色列中央银行连续第 14 次会议维持利率不变，因为人们仍然担心加沙近两年的战争会对经济造成影响。【原文：Israel’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for the 14th consecutive meeting, as concerns over the economic impact of the nearly two-year war in Gaza remain.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行与美国发布联合声明，承诺避免操纵汇率
item.description: 瑞士和美国发表联合声明，誓言不操纵货币，瑞士国家银行承诺将货币政策的重点放在价格稳定上。【原文：Switzerland and the US issued a joint statement vowing to not manipulate currencies, with the Swiss National Bank pledging to keep its monetary policy focused on price stability.】

item.title: 德意志银行民调显示法国最有可能面临债券危机
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一项调查显示，法国是未来两年最有可能遭遇政府债券危机的国家，超过了英国和美国等其他国家。【原文：France is the country most likely to encounter a government bond crisis in the next two years, topping peers including the UK and US, according to a Deutsche Bank AG survey.】

item.title: 印度宣布与不丹开展价值 4.54 亿美元的铁路项目
item.description: 印度和不丹将开发两国的第一条跨境铁路，该项目预计耗资 403 亿卢比（4.54 亿美元），将于四年内完工。【原文：India and Bhutan will develop their first cross-border rail link, a 40.3 billion-rupee ($454 million) project slated for completion in four years.】

item.title: 内塔尼亚胡在与科技投资者的私人会议上讨论人工智能问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡周日在纽约会见了美国科技高管和投资者，讨论利用人工智能促进以色列经济和军事能力发展的前景。【原文：Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu met with US tech executives and investors in New York on Sunday to discuss the prospects for using artificial intelligence to boost his country’s economy and military capabilities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将就丹格特公司威胁石油停产的纠纷与工会会面
item.description: 尼日利亚政府将与该国石油和天然气行业最大的工会组织举行会谈，以化解因与非洲首富阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）的纠纷而面临的原油停产威胁。【原文：Nigeria’s government will hold talks with the nation’s biggest labor group in the oil and gas industry to defuse a threat to shut down crude production over a dispute with Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest person.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔或将以 4.91 亿美元的价格竞购 IDC 南非分公司
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，南非顶级开发金融机构正与财务顾问合作，可能出价约 85 亿兰特（约合 4.91 亿美元）收购安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）在南非的业务控制权。【原文：South Africa’s top development finance institution is working with financial advisers on a possible bid of about 8.5 billion rand ($491 million) for control of ArcelorMittal SA’s business in the country, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩称通胀前景 "合理乐观
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，他认为通胀在两个方向上都不会面临任何重大风险，这表明他和他的同事们可能乐于暂时维持利率不变。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said he doesn’t see any major risks to inflation in either direction, suggesting he and his colleagues may be happy to leave interest rates where they are for the time being.】

item.title: 联盟、BDT 在洗衣机公司首次公开募股中寻求 7.512 亿美元投资
item.description: Alliance Laundry Holdings Inc. 及其私募股权支持者希望在这家商用洗衣机和烘干机制造商的首次公开募股中筹集高达 7.512 亿美元的资金。【原文：Alliance Laundry Holdings Inc. and its private equity backer are looking to raise as much as $751.2 million in the initial public offering of the maker of commercial washers and dryers.】

item.description: 匈牙利统计局大幅修改了一项贫困指标，因为该指标显示，在维克多-欧尔班总理的领导下，社会趋势有所改善，但该方法遭到了批评。【原文：Hungary’s statistics office significantly revised one of its poverty indicators after criticism over methodology that showed improved social trends under Prime Minister Viktor Orban.】

item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）正在就与约 45 亿欧元（53 亿美元）企业贷款和租赁合同相关的两项重大风险转移向投资者发出邀请。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is sounding out investors for two significant risk transfers tied to about €4.5 billion ($5.3 billion) of corporate loans and leasing contracts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩洛哥债券在 S&P 获得令人垂涎的投资评级后上涨
item.description: 在 S&P 全球评级公司授予摩洛哥王国非洲唯一的欧洲债券发行人投资级评级后，摩洛哥的主权债券上涨，在 2030 年世界杯足球赛之前增强了其筹资能力。【原文：Morocco’s sovereign bonds rose after S&P Global Ratings awarded the kingdom the only investment-grade rating for a Eurobond issuer in Africa, boosting its fundraising power ahead of the 2030 soccer World Cup.】

item.title: 美联储沃勒称技术可提供更多支付选择

item.title: 美国黄金储备在创纪录上涨后价值达到 1 万亿美元
